definition: threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
half of a game or contest/half-court
to be present/to be on the scene

sentences.chinese: 相反，犹他最近13场却输了10场。
相反，犹他最近13场却输了10场。

sentences.english: The two dueled, transforming the office of politics into an arena of lightsaber combat.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩展开决斗，把政府办公室变成光剑格斗场。

sentences.english: Like a little hamster, who once spend his days in a RV pank.
sentences.chinese: 比如一只小仓鼠，每天都只能在一个旅行车场度日。

sentences.english: The Russian Defense Ministry dismissed claims of the airport bombing as disinformation .
sentences.chinese: 俄国防部指出关于轰炸机场的消息并不属实。

sentences.english: On Wednesday, it was a sampler. She says the stripling's fun.
sentences.chinese: 一个星期三场音乐会真是有点拼命干，对不对？

sentences.english: China Philharmonic Orchestra is putting on a series of twelve concerts in winter.
sentences.chinese: 今年冬天中国爱乐乐团将举办十二场系列音乐会。

sentences.english: In today's P. E. class, we are going to learn.
sentences.chinese: 今天的体育课，我们要去跤场学习摔跤。

sentences.english: Fig. 5 depicts the Southern Hemisphere midlatitude 300-hPa geopotential height field.
sentences.chinese: 图5给出南半球中纬度300百帕位势高度场。

sentences.english: Invest in a dairy farm and you'll have lots of liquid assets.
sentences.chinese: 投资牛奶场，你会有很多流动资产。

sentences.english: Probe errors analysis and correction are the key technique in time domain near field measurement.
sentences.chinese: 探头误差分析和修正是时域近场测量中的关键技术。

sentences.english: Discover the magical world of Mini Ninjas, and play one of the 3 ninja games.
sentences.chinese: 迷你忍者发现了魔法世界，发挥忍者的3场比赛之一。

sentences.english: He was scheduled to begin a series of 1550 comeback concerts in London.
sentences.chinese: 原计划他在伦敦会进行50场的复出演唱会。

sentences.english: Late last year Chengdu's market was suddenly closed down.
sentences.chinese: 去年成都地票交易场突然关闭。

sentences.english: So the hippodrome is the circus in Latin.
sentences.chinese: 所以赛马场就是拉丁语中的马戏表演场。

sentences.english: She bowled the ball smoothly down the lane.
sentences.chinese: 她很顺当地把球投入地滚球场的球道。

definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
to screen (a movie)/to stage (a play)/a screening/a staging
to pit oneself against sb/to compete with sb/contest/battle/to haggle/to quibble
to defeat decisively/to win decisively/great victory/triumph
to arrive at (place or time)/period/to become due/classifier for events, meetings, elections, sporting fixtures, years (of graduation)
